title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5908.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5908.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

The regulations contained in this Part shall apply to all
applications to the New York State Science and Technology Foundation for
financial assistance under the technology and disabilities
program. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
5908.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
